articles.title: Child Tax Credit Monthly Payments to Begin Soon - The New York Times
articles.description: The Biden administration will send up to $300 per child a month to most American families thanks to a temporary increase in the child tax credit that advocates hope to extend.

articles.title: Teary-eyed Neymar embraces Messi after Copa America final defeat - Goal.com
articles.description: England captain Harry Kane has been the latest voice in soccer, sports and government to condemn the racist abuse directed at his teammates Bukayo Saka, Jadon Sancho and Marcus Rashford on social media in the wake of the penalty-kick shootout loss to Italy.
